verses.text: Aljocab' wach' lolonel t'a Jehová, aton tz'ak'an vip. Aton val tzin k'ayb'ani, syak'anpax in jelanil yic wach' svak' oval.
Aton icha in nhaq'ueen, icha val in cuartel, in Columal paxi. A' tzin k'ub'aneli. A' ayoch venhuloc. A' tz'ak'anoch eb' chonhab' t'a yalanh in mandar.
Mamin Jehová ¿tas val jab'oc quelk'och a onh anima onh tik t'a yol a sat, yuj chi' tzonh a nacoti? ¿Tas val quelk'ochi yuj chi' tzonh a ya'ilej?
Ha onh anima onh tik, lajan onh icha val b'aj squik' quik', haxo co q'uinal icha val junok enhul tz'eq'ui.
Mamin, jac spuertail satcha’anh yic tzach emuli. Tzach emul t'a jolomtac vitz yic sq'ue stab'il lum uuj.
Julemta junok a jul-lab', aton jun k'ak' tzek' copnajoc, tza pechanb'at eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayach t'a skal somk'olal.
Masanto t'a satcha’anh chi' tzaq'uemta a k'ab' tzin a colanel t'a jun ha' mar te niwan, syalelk'ochi, aton eb' ch'oc chonhab'il.
Colinel t'a eb' esalvum chi', aton eb' syik'chaanh sk'ab' syak'an sti' t'a tastac manh yeloc.
Ach in Diosal, ol in b'itej jun ak' b'it t'ayach. Ol in b'itan yet' sb'ital salterio t'ayach.
Uuj val, syal yuj eb' rey, a ach ton ix in a col t'a q'uen espada tzonh milanchamoc, a in David a checab' in tik.
Ha ticnaic, colinel t'a yol sk'ab' eb' ch'oc chonhab'il, eb' esalvum syak' sti' t'a tastac manh yeloc syala'.
Q'uib'ocab' eb' cuninal icha val tas tz'avchaj to ya ilab'il. Ha eb' ix quisil lajanocab' eb' ix icha junok yoyal templo tzeyb'il, te wach' yilji.
Ha co pat, b'ud'jinacocab'el yuj junjun makan vael. Ha nok' co calnel, q'uib'ocab' sb'isul nok' t'a smilal. Manhxo b'ischajb'enocab' tz'aj sb'isul nok' co vacax.
Uneviocab' nok', mocab' tonhejoc tzek' sti' nok'. Malajocab' mach tz'el yav t'a yol scalleal co chonhab' yuj yaelal.
Yelxo val te wach' yic junok chonhab' to icha chi' yaji. Yelxo val te wach' yic junok chonhab' to a Jehová ayoch sDiosaloc.
